roleset.name: hear (in court, as a trial) again

role.descr: entity on trial, if given individually

example.name: rehearing-n
example.text: Sir William Grant's decision in that case was subsequently affirmed by Lord Brougham, in his rehearing of Devaynes v. Noble.

example.name: rehear-v
example.text: Cuellar and Krueger joined two of the previous dissenters in deciding to rehear the appeal.

example.name: rehearing-n
example.text: the warden sent Maus a memorandum stating that his rehearing on the conduct report would be held “as soon as possible,”

roleset.note: REHEAR-V NOTES: Added by Julia for ETW.
REHEARING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for ETW. Comparison to hear.xml hearing.02
